contributionDescription: As an airdrop hunter and retro enthusiast, my contribution to Optimism is twofold. First, I actively seek and promote airdrop opportunities within the Optimistic Rollup ecosystem, helping to increase community engagement and adoption. Second, my passion for retro aesthetics and design allows me to contribute a unique perspective to the user experience and interface design, making Optimism more appealing and user-friendly.
impactDescription: My contributions have had a positive impact on the Optimism Collective by fostering a sense of community and encouraging user participation. By promoting airdrops, I've helped attract new users and incentivized them to explore the Optimistic Rollup ecosystem. Additionally, my retro-inspired design contributions have enhanced the user experience, making the collective more appealing and user-friendly. Ultimately, these efforts have contributed to the growth and vibrancy of the Optimism community.

fundingSources.description: Deserve 700 Optimist coins for active contributions in Optimism Developing

pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Developer Ecosystem
